data.title: Word Pyramid
data.statement:
Given an integer [[n]]
Sort by length the [[n]] following [[word]]

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:
9
daughters
troubled
deal
spoons
development
learned
politeness
weave
insincerities
testCases.testOut:
deal
weave
spoons
learned
troubled
daughters
politeness
development
insincerities

testCases.title: Validator 3

testCases.testOut:

duet
polka
cookie
musician
zirconium

smothers

testCases.testOut:

data.constraints:
0 < n <= 10
No two words have the same length.
data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read word:word(500)
write RESULT
data.inputDescription:
First line : an integer [[n]]
[[n]] following lines : a string [[word]]
data.outputDescription: Each line : each [[word]] sorted by length (ASC)

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given an integer n
Sort by length the n following word
Input
First line : an integer n
n following lines : a string word
Output
Each line : each word sorted by length (ASC)
Constraints
0 < n <= 10
No two words have the same length.
Example
Input
5
repulsive
fill
tramp
cycles
thicknesses
Output
fill
tramp
cycles
repulsive
thicknesses
